KPIDefinition.Description: The Scrap ratio is the relationship between the Scrap quantity (SQ) and the produced quantity (PQ).
KPIDefinition.Name: Scrap Ratio
KPIDefinition.Scope: Work unit, work centre, area, product, time period, product, defect types
KPIDefinition.Formula: Scrap Ratio = Scrap Quantity / Produced Quantity
KPIDefinition.Notes: ”This indicator is usable as real-time indicator for the operator level.”
